column1: #text=I wanted to take a trip to see my friends .
#text=Since they lived far away I decided to fly in an airplane to go see them .
#text=I went to an online website for the airline to book my flight .
#text=I chose a window seat so I could enjoy the scenery on the flight .
#text=After booking my flight I packed my suitcase with what I would need for my flight that left tomorrow .
#text=The very next day I woke up and got dressed .
#text=I wore loose fitting clothes that would be comfortable on the flights .
#text=I wore shoes that I could take off easily to get through security and a belt with no metal in it , again so I could get through security easier .
#text=I went to the airport with my suitcase and went to the ticket counter .
#text=I gave them my ID card and they printed my ticket for me .
#text=I gave them my suitcase and they tagged it for me and gave me a baggage claim ticket .
#text=After making it through secutity I went to my gate and waited until I was told it was time to board the plane .
#text=I got on the plane in my window seat .
#text=I listed to the stewardess as she showed me how to buckle my seatbelt and the planes safety features .
#text=Before I kew it we took off , and I was flying in a plane and enjoying the scenery below .
